tasks.title: Implement Weighted Edits Support
tasks.rationale: To enhance similarity scoring by allowing certain character substitutions to count differently in edit distance calculations.

tasks.title: Add Max-Distance Cutoff Option
tasks.rationale: To improve performance by allowing the distance method to return early for strings that exceed a specified threshold.
deliverables: New methods distance(s1, s2, max_dist=N) and similarity(s1, s2, max_dist=N)

tasks.title: Implement Multi-Threaded Batch Computation
tasks.rationale: To allow users to process large lists of strings in parallel, improving performance for bulk similarity ranking.
deliverables: New batch method batch_distance(list1, list2, threads=T)

tasks.title: Output Edit Operations Path
tasks.rationale: To provide users with detailed information on the edit operations performed during distance calculations.

tasks.title: Support Unicode Grapheme Clusters
tasks.rationale: To ensure that multi-codepoint characters are treated as a single unit in distance calculations, improving correctness.
deliverables: Tests covering grapheme vs code-point scenarios

tasks.title: Introduce Pure-Python Fallback Module
tasks.rationale: To ensure functionality on platforms where the C extension cannot compile, improving portability.
deliverables: Automatic selection if C extension load fails
